dir-section.heading: Local Government
dir-section.p: There are 38 municipalities in Kosovo, each of which has an elected assembly. Local elections took place in two rounds on 17 October and 14 November 2021.
Elections took place in four Serb-majority municipalities on 23 April 2023, which were boycotted by ethnic Serbs.
